person.persName: Richard G. Burton (Madison County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, merchant. Boyle County, Kentucky, native. Son of John A. Burton and Lucinda Burton. Married to Amelia C. Holloway Burton in Madison County, Kentucky, on August 19, 1852. Father of William Burton, John Burton, Clarence Burton, Henry Burton, and Elizabeth Burton. Merchant in Boyle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seventeen enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850. Merchant in Madison County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860. Merchant in Madison County in 1863.
